name: A Bakers Dozen (Demo; Skipping courses)
description:
Hello, I am Dawno :) This game is the demo version of what I want to finish very soon! It is A Bakers Dozen! And it was finally made for the Yandere Jam :D

Within the game your character to play has just moved from their home a few states over to complete their college at a place that had the best reputation for their programs and student college life. Though, they didn’t mind that stuff too much. 

After getting a great deal on an upper apartment close to their school from their Aunts friend, they were set and ready to finish their education.

But every week someone tries to push them and every week they try to stay sane! How does this keep happening?? What is the common denominator??? Who will win, Gabriel’s sanity or whichever Yandere that they accidentally picked up this week?????????

WARNINGS; This game includes “Yandere” content that includes but is not limited to, mentions of stalking, violence, and murder.

///I am most definitely a new dev if you couldn’t already guess so I apologize if anything in-game within my control is absolutely insufferable. But making this game was really fun and I actually got a lot done but only so much was actually playable lmfao. Also this is supposed to be a serious game I’m sorry if I may make tiverem like it’s not lolol. I just made this in a really short time cuz I heard of the jam way too late <\3

Anyways hope you enjoy and if you wanna see more follow my socials!!
